text: Me lolo hava ute hi a tangaloi ram toga mwaso siserigi lehe, nora tangaloi doluegi hi ram toga gangarani meire rai buluie huri na turegine mo vano Jerusalem gena: vatu renige mena vatu homu, gena vivilangogi doluegi, mena kankarue, me gena hogohogo ngerehi vin veiana gena loloi domire, huri na valei Huqe Mauri lolo Jerusalem.‚Äù
